snippet: Giving it an extra four years would provide more time for scientific and commercial experiments.
abstract: Editorial praises Obama administration's decision to extend the international space station's time in orbit by at least four years; urges Congress to appropriate enough money to keep the United States at the forefront in all realms of space research and exploration.
lead_paragraph: Giving it an extra four years would provide more time for scientific and commercial experiments.

headline.main: A Longer Life for the Space Station
headline.print_headline: A Longer Life for the Space Station
